text:
Yes, we are angry. Our hearts are aching because they killed our men. India has faced repeated terrorist attacks, and the list of terrorists is only growing longer.
Pakistan PM Imran Khan finally addressed the issue making all of us angrier. He denied his country’s involvement in Thursday’s attack. “I have an offer for the Indian government: if you have any actionable evidence, share it with us and we will take action,” he said.
Twitter
Not only that, he also warned us of a war and said Pakistan would strike back if India launched an attack after last week’s suicide bombing case.
Reacting to this, Javed Akhtar, who along with wife Shabana Azmi had cancelled an event in Pakistan following the Pulwama attack, said Imran Khan has thrown a no ball.
